example.name: Allergy
example.text: If she consumes peanuts, her throat constringes to the point that she cannot breathe.
example.arg: to the point that she cannot breathe

predicate.note: Frames file for 'constringe' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VerbNet.Verbnet class other_cos-45.4, other framed members include decrease, halt, sweeten, and many others. Comparison with constrict, narrow.
